level.text: 2548.1 All CPA firms that perform audits, reviews, compilations, or anyngagements governed by the Statements on Standards for Attestation EngagementsSSAE), Statements on Auditing Standards (SAS), or Statements on Standards forccounting and Review Services (SSARS) shall enroll in and complete anpproved peer review program with standards that are equivalent to, or betterhan, those established by the American Institute of Certified Publicccountants (AICPA), as determined by the Board.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 5186 (May 18, 2012).
